All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BackgroundMusic
Controls the starting and stopping of background music
ButtonController
Used to display an image with tips on how to beat a level.
Cat
The character the user plays as.
CatController
Detects when a key is pressed to control the movement of the cat, and when the cat does damage.
Game
Your main game entry point
GameLevel
The general features that every level contains.
GameOverMenu
 
GameOverMenuBackground
Background for a screen shown when the cat loses all lives.
GameView
The view shown when the player plays, used to show different backgrounds, the number of lives and stars.
GhostEnemy
The enemy used in level 1 that moves randomly.
GhostEnemyDamage
CollisionListener that detects when the player is walked into the GhostEnemy,
GhostMover
Controls the random movement of GhostEnemy.
IcePlatform
A platform that looks like ice and has less friction.
Level1
The first level of the game, no requirements are required to pass.
Level2
The second level of the game, no requirements are required to pass.
Level2Enemy
An enemy implemented in Level2, that is immune to shots made by the cat.
Level2EnemyShoot
Controls the shooting of Level2Enemy.
Level3
The third level of the game, 2 stars have to be collected to pass.
Level4
The fourth level of the game, 3 stars have to be collected to pass.
LevelEndDoor
The door that is displayed at the end of every level,
LevelEndDoorCollide
Detects when the player has collided with the LevelEndDoor.
MovingEnemy
An enemy that follows the cat, is used in Level3 and Level4.
MovingEnemyDamage
Detects when the cat hits the MovingEnemy.
nextLevelButtonBackground
A background for the nextLevel button shown in the end of level screen.
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
ProjectileDamage
Determines the impact a projectile has on an enemy, this is specific to the level.
quitButtonBackground
A background for the quit button shown in the end of level screen.
restartButtonBackground
A background for the restart button shown in the end of level screen.
SandPlatform
A platform that looks like sand.
SandPlatformSound
Plays the walking on sand sound everytime the cat walks on a SandPlatform/
Spikes
A spike that does damage if stepped on.
SpikesDamage
Detects when the cat has collided with a spike and decreases a life.
SplashMenu
 
SplashMenuBackground
The background for the end of level screen.
Stars
Are collected by the cat.
StarsPickup
Detects when the cat collides with a star, and adds stars onto the cat.
StonePlatform
A platform that looks like stone.
TipsImage
 
Tracker
Tracks the movement of the cat.
Trampoline
A trampoline with a higher restitution, allowing the cat to jump higher.
WoodPlatform
A platform that looks like wood.
